doc:
Max Showalter https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Max_Showalter 0 Max Showalter (June 2, 1917 – July 30, 2000), sometimes credited as Casey Adams, was an American film, television, and stage actor, as well as a composer, pianist, and singer. He appeared on more than 1,000 television programs. One of Showalter's most memorable roles was as Jean Peters' character's husband in the 1953 film Niagara. Max_Showalter ( June_2_,_1917 – July_30_,_2000 ) , sometimes_credited as Casey_Adams , was an_American_film , television , and stage_actor , as_well_as a_composer , pianist , and singer . He appeared on more_than_1,000_television_programs . One of Showalter 's_most_memorable_roles was as Jean_Peters '_character 's_husband in the_1953_film_Niagara .
